name: Endless Green
description:
When Rudi goes out looking for adventure one day, he finds it - along with the robotic head of Dr. Cornelius H Somerton.  Together they set off on a quest to rid the world of the Green - the fast-growing vines engulfing the world.

  • Explore - Travel through the ruins of an ancient culture lost beneath the vines!
  • Battle - Gain skills by equipping weapons - master them by completing tasks!
  • Investigate - Be warned that the ancients were fond of riddles - and traps!

A 1 hour demo created for the IGMC 2018 game jam.
